description: This looks like exactly the program I need - but the snap permissions won't let it access any hard drives or CDs outside of the protected snap environment - therefore sort of defeating the point of it! There's no "permissions" button in the Ubuntu Store to change the permissions, so I imagine it has to be done via terminal, or perhaps needs repackaging.

Works pretty well.
In Debian Testing (at 20sep2020) no extra 'permissions' are needed.
By the way: in "snap-store" there are some settings to change if you need to.
Strange: my old catalogs show file sizes of '0' (zero). All other data is ok.
Newely added catalogs show the right file sizes.

This app does not show up anywhere in my system. There is no launch button and it cannot be located under "All Applications"

I'm really tired of half-assed software that does NOT go the distance. C'mon man, fix this!
summary: would be a great app if I could find it

description: Just re-installed from updated snap 7/11/2022 and it had a permissions click on that solved the former permissions issues and makes it work like it had before Ubuntu 22.04 LTS. I've used it to catalog CD, DVD and drives for years under Ubuntu. Great to see it working again.
summary: Permissions issue fixed in snap as of 7/11/2022
